column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Jamie - Thank you very much for the stars. I'm very pleased to know you enjoyed our ramen and that you received good service during your visit. Please never hesitate to request a different seat if you're not happy with what's available. While we have to keep it fair for everyone
column2: we will gladly relocate you to the best of our ability. We appreciate your taking the time to review us
column3: and we hope you'll come through again soon!
